title: Innovative Guangzhou Stay with Maritime Silk Road-Inspired Interior Design
description: Where the ancient world and the ultra-modern collide, Guangzhou is a mix of temples, dim-sum eateries and state-of-the-art architectural marvels, best discovered from the InterContinental Guangzhou Exhibition Center, an IHG Hotel. Indulge in authentic Cantonese cuisine at Canal Luna, sink into prime Australian Wagyu steak at Char's open-kitchen restaurant, or order a drink in the Lobby Lounge, where a live jazz band plays nightly and the hotel's Maritime Silk Road-inspired design is on full display.
location_description: InterContinental Guangzhou Exhibition Center, an IHG Hotel

title: Guangzhou Airport Novotel Escape 30 Minutes from CBD with Onsite Restaurant
description:
Located just steps from Novotel Guangzhou Baiyun Airport, this contemporary hotel offers a seamless blend of comfort and convenience. Each of the hotel's spacious rooms features plush bedding, modern amenities and a tranquil atmosphere, perfect for a restful night's sleep after a long flight.

Should you wish to explore, you'll be within easy reach of Guangzhou. Discover the city's vibrant culture and history with easy access to attractions including the stunning Baiyun Mountain and the bustling Beijing Road Shopping District. After a day of exploration, dine on exquisite Cantonese cuisine at the onsite restaurant.
offer_address: 1 Konggangjiudian Road, Huadu District, Guangzhou, Guangdong, 510470, China

title: South China Urban Elegance with Indoor Pool, Onsite Dining & Sky Lounge
description:
Boasting a prime position in the city's central business district, Zhujiang New Town, is the five-star Grand Hyatt Guangzhou. This architectural masterpiece offers contemporary rooms, a stunning penthouse lounge and a dreamy indoor pool for leisurely aps in between urban exploration.

Savour perfectly grilled steaks and fresh seafood at G Restaurant, the hotel's signature restaurant, or sip a cocktail at the chic G Bar. With the Guangzhou Opera House, Guangdong Museum and the high-end boutiques of Taikoo Hui shopping mall within easy reach, this is the perfect base for exploring the city's cultural and retail treasures.
offer_address: 12 Zhujiang W Rd, Tianhe District, Guangzhou, Guangdong 510623, China

title: Guangzhou Hotel Only Minutes from the Airport
description: Only minutes from the airport, Crowne Plaza Guangzhou Huada, an IHG Hotel, is a gleaming glass gateway to this sprawling port city. Work up an appetite at the outdoor pool or fitness centre before sampling sumptuous Cantonese cuisine at Crowne Court restaurant or global dishes at the Garden Cafe. Visit vibrant shopping malls a short walk away for a spot of retail therapy before returning to the hotel as the sun sets for a sophisticated cocktail in the lobby bar.
location_description: Crowne Plaza Guangzhou Huadu, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: No.189 Ying Bin Da Dao, Huadu District, Guangzhou 510800, China

title: Guangzhou Sky-High Elegance with Three Restaurants, Swimming Pool & Spa
description:
Nestled in Guangzhou's Tianhe District, this hotel transcends the ordinary with its fusion of French elegance and Cantonese charm. Boasting rooms with floor-to-ceiling windows, a spa sanctuary and five bars and restaurants, including the panoramic Mar-Tea-Ni Lounge, this urban oasis invites you to indulge mere steps from premier shopping and cultural attractions.

Dive into the 30-metre indoor infinity pool while gazing at Guangzhou's skyline, or sample French expressions of beauty and fragrances at the spa. With the Tianhe commercial district and Canton Tower just moments away, Sofitel Guangzhou Sunrich perfectly positions you to explore this dynamic metropolis while providing a serene haven to return to.
offer_address: 988 Guangzhou Da Dao Zhong, Tianhe District, Guangzhou 510620, China

title: Guangzhou Refined Urban Retreat Overlooking Dongjiang River
description: Crowne Plaza Guangzhou Zengcheng, an IHG Hotel, offers a soothing urban escape with convenient access to this vibrant city. Start your day by revitalising your mind and body at the fitness centre or enjoying a soothing treatment at the onsite spa. Venture out to experience Cantonese cuisine at restaurants nearby, or sample a selection of global cuisines at the three restaurants onsite before savouring a sophisticated cocktail in the lobby lounge.
location_description: Crowne Plaza Guangzhou Zengcheng, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: No.18 Yanjiang Avenue, Xintang Town, Zengcheng District, Guangzhou 511300, China

title: Sky-High South China Hyatt Elegance with Infinity Pool, Onsite Dining & Spa
description:
Towering above Guangzhou's CBD, Park Hyatt provides breathtaking views of Pearl River. This architectural masterpiece offers contemporary rooms, a stunning 60th-floor infinity pool and a world-class spa. Impeccable service meets exquisite design, creating an urban sanctuary for both business and leisure travellers amidst the city's dynamic energy.

Strategically positioned in Zhujiang New Town, the hotel offers easy access to Guangzhou Opera House and premier shopping. Culinary excellence awaits at three signature restaurants and a rooftop bar, where chefs and mixologists transform local ingredients into artistic creations. After exploring nearby Canton Tower, return to your elegant haven high above the city.
offer_address: 16 Huaxia Road, Tianhe District, Guangzhou, Guangdong Province 510620, China
